CmdLine: apt-get -qqy update     && apt-get -qqy --no-install-recommends install     xvfb     pulseaudio     g++     build-essential     dbus     phantomjs     dbus-x11 &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /var/cache/apt/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_10.x | bash - &&     apt-get update -qqy && apt-get -qqy install -y nodejs &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /var/cache/apt/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add - &&     echo "deb http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list &&     apt-get update -qqy && apt-get -qqy install ${CHROME_VERSION:-google-chrome-stable} &&     rm /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /var/cache/apt/* &&     ln -s /usr/bin/google-chrome /usr/bin/chromium-browser
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: wget -q -O - https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add - &&     echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list &&     apt-get update -qqy && apt-get -qqy install yarn &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /var/cache/apt/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: chmod u+rx,g+rx,o+rx,a-w /opt/docker-entrypoint-hook.sh &&     mkdir /tmp/.X11-unix | true &&     chown -R root:root /tmp/.X11-unix &&     chmod 1777 /tmp/.X11-unix
Commands.Name: run
